name: git ignore
description: Quickly and easily list and fetch .gitignore templates from gitignore.io. Works offline by caching the templates as well.

name: git anger management
description: Ever wanted to know just how angry your commits are? This small utility checks all the commits in a repository for naughty words and their authors.

name: MOCCA: MOCCA Operational Controller for Coffee Availability
description: As a student, one of the most important questions while studying is whether there is coffee left in our brewer. As enterprising students, me and a friend built a system that automatically detects when and for how long coffee has been brewing, how hot it is and how much is left.

name: My dotfiles
description: These are my dotfiles, there are many like them but these ones are mine...

name: Frontend configurations
description: Because I hate configuration I created a shared monorepo where my configuration for Prettier, ESLint, TypeScript and so on is stored.

name: RepliesWithTime
description: A silly little Twitter bot that replies with the current time... useful for those times when you have Twitter available but no clock.

name: Nixpkgs (NixOS)
description: Nix package manager repository, I am a maintainer for a few packages that I both develop and use regularly.

name: Fagkveld.it
description: Website for a regular event where companies come to the University of Bergen and share their knowledge, organize workshops and more.

name: echo karriere website
description: Website for the informatics career fair at the University of Bergen.
